claim: Hate is practiced by a Hate group against a sexual orientation.
premise_source_doc_sentence: A hate group is a social group that advocates and practices hatred , hostility , or violence towards members of a race , ethnicity , nation , religion , gender , gender identity , sexual orientation or any other designated sector of society .

claim: Hate is practiced by a Hate group against a sexual orientation.
premise_source_doc_sentence: According to the United States Federal Bureau of Investigation  (  FBI  )  , a hate group 's `` primary purpose is to promote animosity , hostility , and malice against persons belonging to a race , religion , disability , sexual orientation , or ethnicity/national origin which differs from that of the members of the organization . ''
